The pilgrimage to paradise Compiled for the direction, comfort, and resolution of Gods poore distressed children, in passing through this irkesome wildernesse of temptation and tryall. By Leonard Wright. Seene and allowed. Wright, Leonard, b. 1555 or 6.
[6], 58, [2] p. : ill.
Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shoppe against the broad south doore of Paules, London : 1591.
With a final index leaf. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
